column1: For many this Thanksgiving will not be the joyous occasion it often is after such a tough year. Today we should all take time to reflect on those things we take for granted and know a new day is dawning in our country. There is much to be thankful for! #HappyThanksgiving 🦃🦃
Happy Diwali and Saal Mubarak to all who celebrate.  May light continue to prevail over darkness and may the festival fill everyone with peace and love! #Diwali
A truly moving letter from the president-elect to our wonderful state of neighbors. Delaware loves you & we couldn’t be prouder @JoeBiden. https://t.co/RRnI51kkDJ
.@RonaldKlain has exactly the kind of experience we need in the White House right now. He’s an excellent choice to help lead this administration. https://t.co/r9z9KZ9FBK
It’s a beautiful day in Delaware and an incredible day for America. https://t.co/c53uumhbLi

Every single person in the LGBTQ+ community should be able to live without fear of discrimination in this country. That's why I am a strong supporter of the Equality Act and will continue to fight for the right of every Delawarean to live as their true selves. #DelawareDebates

We are already seeing the consequences of climate change right here in Delaware. While centering environmental justice we need to take bold action that meets the magnitude of this crisis. #DelawareDebates

Our country works best when we take an active role in our democracy. I would encourage all Delawareans to make their voices heard by both voting and advocating for the change that they believe is necessary. #DelawareDebates

Health care coverage was made available to millions of Americans through the #ACA and getting rid of it during a pandemic would be catastrophic. Everybody should have access to affordable healthcare in this country. #DelawareDebates

How would I rate the Trump Administration's response to COVID-19? That's easy: it has been a national tragedy. No strategy no plans no coordination and has cost hundreds thousands of American lives. #DelawareDebates

From securing affordable reliable health care to preparing Delaware’s workforce for the economy of tomorrow or protecting Delaware’s natural heritage from the existential threat of climate change it’s been the honor of my life working on behalf of Delaware in Congress.

We can continue down the path of Donald Trump’s Republican party. Or we can choose a better and brighter path - the path of Joe Biden’s Democratic Party where we listen to science choose hope over fear and build back better from this pandemic.

Over these last 4 years Lisa has worked every day for:  ✅Delaware’s Farmers ✅Small Businesses ✅Social Justice ✅Our Environment ✅Healthcare  If re-elected you can bet that she’ll do the same and much more!

My philosophy was a simple one come together to make progress where we can fight for what we believe in when we can’t and always act with love and keep Delaware values at the center of everything I do.

Those Republican leaders who continuously enable him have shown time and again that there is no low to which he could stoop no crisis he could so badly mismanage and no lie he could tell too farfetched that would lose him their support.
